testsuite.name: Validation on Sign Up Positive test cases

testcase.name: Verify that the browser is lauched.Clicks on the Signup button and navigates to Signup page
Verify clicking on login link will navigate to login page
Verify that the data entered in both Password and Confirm password fields are masked
Verify that the password should be displayed on an eye click for Password fields
Verify that the Confirm password field by comparing data entered in the Password field
Verify click on Sign Up with valid credentials
Verify the scenario when navigate to the otp Login page
